overview:
## Return Value

The value of the given property.

## Discussion

The type of the value depends on the property type (see [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/property_types] for a list of possible property types). Note that the returned value is always of an immutable type (for example, an `NSString` type, not an `NSMutableString` type, is returned).

If `property` is `nil`, this method raises an exception. If `property` is invalid, this method returns `nil`.

For a list of the available properties, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/UserExperience/Conceptual/AddressBook/Tasks/AccessingData.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/20001023] in [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/UserExperience/Conceptual/AddressBook/AddressBook.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/10000117i].

# value(forProperty:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the value of a given property for a record.

## Declaration

```swift
func value(forProperty property: String!) -> Any!
```

## Parameters

- **property**: The property whose value will be returned.

## Return Value

The value of the given property.

## Discussion

The type of the value depends on the property type (see [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/property_types] for a list of possible property types). Note that the returned value is always of an immutable type (for example, an `NSString` type, not an `NSMutableString` type, is returned).

If `property` is `nil`, this method raises an exception. If `property` is invalid, this method returns `nil`.

For a list of the available properties, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/UserExperience/Conceptual/AddressBook/Tasks/AccessingData.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/20001023] in [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/UserExperience/Conceptual/AddressBook/AddressBook.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/10000117i].

## Retrieving and Setting Values

- **removeValue(forProperty:)**: Removes the value for a given property.
- **setValue(_:forProperty:)**: Sets the value of a given property for a record.
- **setValue(_:forProperty:error:)**: Sets the value of a given property for a record, returning error information.
